des:
Complete your physical therapy exercises whenever you want, wherever you want, and by using whatever device you want. Introducing VoicePT.

VoicePT is a free, voice-first software system that increases home exercise program adherence, which leads to better outcomes, faster recoveries, and has less chance for injury recurrence.

Voice-activated physical therapy leaves your hands free to focus on the correct movements of each exercise instead of trying to awkwardly navigate paper images or even having to look at your phone.

Doing physical therapy exercises is hard! Common pitfalls can include:
- Keeping track of exercises: order, timing, and counting
- Remembering how to do your exercises properly
- Motivation to get through them
- Feeling like you are left on your own to do them

As a result, only 35% of people complete their prescribed physical therapy exercises at home.

VoicePT makes it easier! Instead of navigating a piece of paper that has written directions and illustrations, VoicePT provides users with personalized, prescribed routines from their healthcare professionals that have complete, hands-free voice instruction that helps them focus on the correct movements for recovery. Motivational prompts are also included to help our users maintain a consistent schedule.

How the VoicePT skill for Amazon Alexa works: Saying “Alexa, start my physical therapy” to an Amazon Alexa enabled device will start voice-guided exercise programs, reinforcing proper techniques through tailored, individualized instruction specific to each user. VoicePT also keeps track of progress and provides structure so our users can focus on accurately doing their exercises.

VoicePT is available on all Amazon Alexa enabled devices, including TV’s, tablets, speakers, headphones, frames, and more.

Your reviews and feedback are important to us! If you love using VoicePT, please consider writing a review, or send us an email with your feedback at support@voicept.com.

VoicePT: We get people moving one voice at a time.
